channel.title: How do i loop this?

item.title: How do i loop this?
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

Yea and net time try codeing ure work ok?

Just insurt

repeat

and everything under that will be repeated.

when you want to end a repeat just do this :

until(false or true)

what you would do is enter until(False or True) The False would look like this: until(false)
False just means that i will never end until the script is manualy stopped.

and the true like this until(true)
True means that if something in ure procedure is true it will keep looping until that is true like for example if u have something that goes for a certain amount of time true makes it loop until that is done or true. Ask more people they can explain it better.

All together your script would look like this:

[code]
// RSCD powerminer by fooktard v1.2
//
// Directions: target RSCD client with crosshair
// scroll down to line
//
// PROTIPS:
// Try 2 mine in an area with 3 or 4 of the same type of ore.
// set the automsgs so its not all the ******* same as 5 other ppl who are using the script
// just set the 3 ore colors as 3 different shades of the same ore
//
// HAVE PUBLIC CHAT TURNED OFF 2 STOP PEOPLE ******* WITH THE MOD DETECTION!!

program oreminer;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}

const
orecolor1 = 5951; //ore colors go here
orecolor2 = 4658;
orecolor3 = 2329;
delay = 1500 ; //increase this if you cant 1hit the rock
modmsg = ‘wuts wrong?’; //change this to what u want the script 2 make ur char say if a mod is detected
summondmsg = ‘what did i do?’; // change this to what the want the script to say if ur summoned 2 a mod
var
x,y,mine,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername,banned,modphat,summonedtwo: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
mine := BitmapFromString(23, 9, ‘z78DA33304000370C604077E08’ +
‘60360CA122F42BCF9D47209792EC42F4E79080C1597D0220D501E’ +
‘26F853C8C0C60E79A69117FB83A194200600007ECD1BFC’);

 clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, 'z78DA33304000372440B' +
   'C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412' +
   'E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890' +
   'F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433' +
   '935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0' +
   'A0400510ADDFF');

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');

     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');

     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');

     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

     banned := BitmapFromString(118, 5, 'z78DAED56410E803008FB12' +
   'AFD8FF9FE4D5682494D2CE443932C64A691811575B277BF2447AE' +
   'B6E7BE3EBA7AB6C3D54685D39C2A93C8A78B40B75F67AEFF27A98' +
   'F2E7FA516898418EAAD78F81674681B6D71D855651967AF13A967' +
   '40CA82703FA2330F35F8196E15997F9D7B0BFAED93FF79B1A7EE7' +
   '2EE19C36CE5D82D90D14DD71327600DA922E7E');

     modphat := BitmapFromString(13, 11, 'z78DA3330A037707274723' +
   '430307732774215C71481005743574354BDB84C43560911C1540F' +
   '51838B84A8C71427CF345C24754D839833924D23CF4C5CE6500B0' +
   '000AB69B141');

summonedtwo := BitmapFromString(58, 7, ‘z78DADD56410A002008’ +
‘FB92AFE8FF4F8A6E42189BCB8A76149BBA6C6436D01C2C8878B40’ +
‘073CEFA2CCEC6F2E47A66A743AA473C51049F7457E7088F32B592’ +
‘B9AB3AAE525DDD338A9DCF5474C3DDA04E5B7C1FD8CDB97B5FAC4’ +
‘3B27EAB57D1336F6DB8F22E5EF6DB6AC572DAFEF44F98E31D7AB6’ +
‘3C5F’);
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,3,60,508,351))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,3,60,508,351))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,3,60,508,351))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(5000)
movemouse(259, 220);
wait(200)
clickmouse(259, 220,true);
end;
end;

procedure banscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(banned,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘wtf?’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure modscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(modphat,x,y))then
begin
writeln(’…’);
wait(1000)
typesend(modmsg);
wait(300)
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
wait(100)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure summonedscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(summonedtwo,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘whats wrong?’);
wait(4000)
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
sendkeys(summondmsg +chr(13));
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
wait(3000)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(mine,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘mining’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
wait(2000)
movemouse(487,48);
wait(100)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1500)
clickmouse(283, 77,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
repeat
loaddmps;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rest;
until(false)
end. [/code]

And thats about last just remember one thing, try not to curse in your scripts. =)

Dont use Sendkeys or Clickmouse cause it will get you banned. Even if its for RSCD it will get you banned. I doubt that there’s going to be a lot of Mods in RSCD though. Same goes with MoveMouse’s

Try adding SRL and use typesend. I gave an example in there already. Typesend does not need chr(13) in it so your lucky its easier lol

Read full topic

item.title: How do i loop this?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

begin
repeat
loaddmps;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rest;
until(false)
end.

That would loop your main procedure. If you want certain procedures out of the loop just move them above repeat (or under until(false).

Read full topic

item.title: How do i loop this?
item.dc:creator: @azz88 azz88
item.description:
@azz88 wrote:

The script works fine but it stops when it has done everything… how can i make it into a continuouse loop?

// RSCD powerminer by fooktard v1.2
//
// Directions: target RSCD client with crosshair
// scroll down to line
//
// PROTIPS:
// Try 2 mine in an area with 3 or 4 of the same type of ore.
// set the automsgs so its not all the fucking same as 5 other ppl who are using the script
// just set the 3 ore colors as 3 different shades of the same ore
//
// HAVE PUBLIC CHAT TURNED OFF 2 STOP PEOPLE FUCKING WITH THE MOD DETECTION!!

program oreminer;

const
orecolor1 = 5951; //ore colours go here
orecolor2 = 4658;
orecolor3 = 2329;
delay = 1500 ; //increase this if you cant 1hit the rock
modmsg = ‘wuts wrong?’; //change this to what u want the script 2 make ur char say if a mod is detected
summondmsg = ‘what did i do?’; // change this to what the want the script to say if ur summoned 2 a mod
var
x,y,mine,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername,banned,modphat,summonedtwo: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
mine := BitmapFromString(23, 9, ‘z78DA33304000370C604077E08’ +
‘60360CA122F42BCF9D47209792EC42F4E79080C1597D0220D501E’ +
‘26F853C8C0C60E79A69117FB83A194200600007ECD1BFC’);

 clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, 'z78DA33304000372440B' +
   'C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412' +
   'E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890' +
   'F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433' +
   '935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0' +
   'A0400510ADDFF');

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');

     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');

     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');

     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

     banned := BitmapFromString(118, 5, 'z78DAED56410E803008FB12' +
   'AFD8FF9FE4D5682494D2CE443932C64A691811575B277BF2447AE' +
   'B6E7BE3EBA7AB6C3D54685D39C2A93C8A78B40B75F67AEFF27A98' +
   'F2E7FA516898418EAAD78F81674681B6D71D855651967AF13A967' +
   '40CA82703FA2330F35F8196E15997F9D7B0BFAED93FF79B1A7EE7' +
   '2EE19C36CE5D82D90D14DD71327600DA922E7E');

     modphat := BitmapFromString(13, 11, 'z78DA3330A037707274723' +
   '430307732774215C71481005743574354BDB84C43560911C1540F' +
   '51838B84A8C71427CF345C24754D839833924D23CF4C5CE6500B0' +
   '000AB69B141');

summonedtwo := BitmapFromString(58, 7, ‘z78DADD56410A002008’ +
‘FB92AFE8FF4F8A6E42189BCB8A76149BBA6C6436D01C2C8878B40’ +
‘073CEFA2CCEC6F2E47A66A743AA473C51049F7457E7088F32B592’ +
‘B9AB3AAE525DDD338A9DCF5474C3DDA04E5B7C1FD8CDB97B5FAC4’ +
‘3B27EAB57D1336F6DB8F22E5EF6DB6AC572DAFEF44F98E31D7AB6’ +
‘3C5F’);
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,3,60,508,351))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,3,60,508,351))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,3,60,508,351))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(5000)
movemouse(259, 220);
wait(200)
clickmouse(259, 220,true);
end;
end;

procedure banscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(banned,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘wtf?’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure modscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(modphat,x,y))then
begin
writeln(’…’);
wait(1000)
sendkeys(modmsg +chr(13));
wait(300)
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
wait(100)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure summonedscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(summonedtwo,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘whats wrong?’);
wait(4000)
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
sendkeys(summondmsg +chr(13));
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
wait(3000)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(mine,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘mining’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
wait(2000)
movemouse(487,48);
wait(100)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1500)
clickmouse(283, 77,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
loaddmps;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
rest;
end.
